27  package org.apache.http.impl.client.cache;
28  
29  import java.util.Date;
30  
31  import org.apache.http.Header;
32  import org.apache.http.HttpResponse;
33  import org.apache.http.client.cache.HttpCacheEntry;
34  import org.apache.http.impl.cookie.DateUtils;
35  import org.apache.http.message.BasicHeader;
36  import org.easymock.classextension.EasyMock;
37  import org.junit.Assert;
38  import org.junit.Before;
39  import org.junit.Test;
40  
41  public class TestCachedHttpResponseGenerator {
42  
43      private HttpCacheEntry entry;
44      private CacheValidityPolicy mockValidityPolicy;
45      private CachedHttpResponseGenerator impl;
46      private Date now;
47  
48      @Before
49      public void setUp() {
50          now = new Date();
51          Date sixSecondsAgo = new Date(now.getTime() - 6 * 1000L);
52          Date eightSecondsAgo = new Date(now.getTime() - 8 * 1000L);
53          Date tenSecondsAgo = new Date(now.getTime() - 10 * 1000L);
54          Date tenSecondsFromNow = new Date(now.getTime() + 10 * 1000L);
55          Header[] hdrs = { new BasicHeader("Date", DateUtils.formatDate(eightSecondsAgo)),
56                  new BasicHeader("Expires", DateUtils.formatDate(tenSecondsFromNow)),
57                  new BasicHeader("Content-Length", "150") };
58  
59          entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(tenSecondsAgo, sixSecondsAgo, hdrs);
60          mockValidityPolicy = EasyMock.createNiceMock(CacheValidityPolicy.class);
61          impl = new CachedHttpResponseGenerator(mockValidityPolicy);
62      }
63  
64      public void replayMocks() {
65          EasyMock.replay(mockValidityPolicy);
66      }
67  
68      @Test
69      public void testResponseHasContentLength() {
70          byte[] buf = new byte[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 };
71          HttpCacheEntry entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(buf);
72  
73          HttpResponse response = impl.generateResponse(entry);
74  
75          Header length = response.getFirstHeader("Content-Length");
76          Assert.assertNotNull("Content-Length Header is missing", length);
77  
78          Assert.assertEquals("Content-Length does not match buffer length", buf.length, Integer
79                  .parseInt(length.getValue()));
80      }
81  
82      @Test
83      public void testContentLengthIsNotAddedWhenTransferEncodingIsPresent() {
84  
85          Header[] hdrs = new Header[] { new BasicHeader("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked") };
86          byte[] buf = new byte[] { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 };
87          HttpCacheEntry entry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry(hdrs, buf);
88  
89          HttpResponse response = impl.generateResponse(entry);
90  
91          Header length = response.getFirstHeader("Content-Length");
92  
93          Assert.assertNull(length);
94      }
95  
96      @Test
97      public void testResponseMatchesCacheEntry() {
98          HttpResponse response = impl.generateResponse(entry);
99  
100         Assert.assertTrue(response.containsHeader("Content-Length"));
101 
102         Assert.assertSame("HTTP", response.getProtocolVersion().getProtocol());
103         Assert.assertEquals(1, response.getProtocolVersion().getMajor());
104         Assert.assertEquals(1, response.getProtocolVersion().getMinor());
105     }
106 
107     @Test
108     public void testResponseStatusCodeMatchesCacheEntry() {
109         HttpResponse response = impl.generateResponse(entry);
110 
111         Assert.assertEquals(entry.getStatusCode(), response.getStatusLine().getStatusCode());
112     }
113 
114     @Test
115     public void testAgeHeaderIsPopulatedWithCurrentAgeOfCacheEntryIfNonZero() {
116         currentAge(10L);
117         replayMocks();
118 
119         HttpResponse response = impl.generateResponse(entry);
120 
121         Header ageHdr = response.getFirstHeader("Age");
122         Assert.assertNotNull(ageHdr);
123         Assert.assertEquals(10L, Long.parseLong(ageHdr.getValue()));
124     }
125 
126     @Test
127     public void testAgeHeaderIsNotPopulatedIfCurrentAgeOfCacheEntryIsZero() {
128         currentAge(0L);
129         replayMocks();
130 
131         HttpResponse response = impl.generateResponse(entry);
132 
133         Header ageHdr = response.getFirstHeader("Age");
134         Assert.assertNull(ageHdr);
135     }
136 
137     @Test
138     public void testAgeHeaderIsPopulatedWithMaxAgeIfCurrentAgeTooBig() {
139         currentAge(CacheValidityPolicy.MAX_AGE + 1L);
140         replayMocks();
141 
142         HttpResponse response = impl.generateResponse(entry);
143 
144         Header ageHdr = response.getFirstHeader("Age");
145         Assert.assertNotNull(ageHdr);
146         Assert.assertEquals(CacheValidityPolicy.MAX_AGE, Long.parseLong(ageHdr.getValue()));
147     }
148 
149     private void currentAge(long sec) {
150         EasyMock.expect(
151                 mockValidityPolicy.getCurrentAgeSecs(EasyMock.same(entry),
152                         EasyMock.isA(Date.class))).andReturn(sec);
153     }
154 
155 }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
